thread.title: Lance Armstrong to Pay $5 Million to Settle Suit Over Postal Service Sponsorship

author: Joshua Robinson
title: Lance Armstrong to Pay $5 Million to Settle Suit Over Postal Service Sponsorship
text:
Disgraced former cyclist Lance Armstrong will pay $5 million to settle a government lawsuit alleging he defrauded the U.S. Postal Service by accepting millions in sponsorship money despite doping to win multiple Tours de France, the Justice Department announced on Thursday.
The suit was due to proceed to trial next month, where Armstrong stood to lose up to $100 million.
